Class FlightController

java.lang.Object
org.example.galaxy_trucker.Controller.Controller
org.example.galaxy_trucker.Controller.FlightController
public class FlightController extends Controller
The FlightController class is a specific implementation of the Controller class that represents a phase in the game where a player transitions through the "Flight" state. This controller handles commands and transitions associated with the flight mechanics or phase, and determines the game's behavior during this part of the game flow.

  • Constructor Details

    • FlightController

      public FlightController(Player curPlayer, String gameId, GameController gc, boolean disconnected)
      Constructs a FlightController instance, which manages the "Flight" phase for a specific player within the game. This controller handles transitions and player states during the Flight phase and interacts with the overarching GameController for phase management.
      Parameters:
      curPlayer - The player currently involved in the Flight phase.
      gameId - The unique identifier for the game instance.
      gc - An instance of the GameController coordinating the game flow.
      disconnected - A boolean indicating whether the player is currently disconnected.

  • Method Details

    • action

      public void action(Command cmd, GameController gc)
      Executes the action logic for the FlightController, printing a debug message and delegating the execution to the parent class's action method.
      Overrides:
      action in class Controller
      Parameters:
      cmd - the command to be processed, representing a specific player action or state change
      gc - the game controller instance, managing the overall game state and operations

    • nextState

      public void nextState(GameController gc)
      Transitions the game state from the current "Flight" state to the appropriate next state by updating the relevant controller. Ensures that the player's connection status is verified and handled, and initializes a new controller for the subsequent game phase.
      Specified by:
      nextState in class Controller
      Parameters:
      gc - the GameController instance that manages the overall game flow and state transitions across multiple controllers.
